title: Account Compromised/Can't log in?
body:
In order to make this post I had to borrow my friends account.

Last night I logged out after playing a few games. Today I attempted to log in to league to find that my Username or Password was incorrect. I attempted to reset my password, however the e-mail was never sent to me. After this I thought that I had been hacked, which is peculiar since I play on a mac. I checked all my other accounts for other things such as Amazon/Twitch, and none of my other accounts have been compromised leading me to believe that I have not been hacked. I also could not log in to my account through the website. Since the e-mail was never sent to me, I don't really know what to think. Apparently this situation happened to my friends earlier this week. This is definitely not a caps-lock issue, or anything like that.

The account in question has
Username: SlangTerm
Summoner Name: Shooting Stars
Ticket #: #30329719

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it does look like some suspicious activity could have been taking place without your knowing. I saw that you've already sent us a ticket and our account specialists will be able to help as soon as they can! 

Also, keep in mind that if you respond to your ticket before our agents message you that your ticket could be bumped back a little!
